trans-unit.source: Used to group collections of controls.
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> is a control that contains other controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> é um controle que contém outros controles.

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> to group collections of controls such as a group of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> agrupar coleções de controles, como um grupo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> controles.

trans-unit.source: As with other container controls such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property is set to `false`, the controls contained within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> will also be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Assim como acontece com outros controles de contêiner, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> de controle, se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> está definida como `false`, os controles contidos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> também serão desabilitados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control is displayed by default without any borders.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle é exibido por padrão sem bordas.

trans-unit.source: You can provide a standard or three-dimensional border using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A> property to distinguish the area of the panel from other areas on the form.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fornecer uma borda tridimensional ou padrão usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade para distinguir a área do painel de outras áreas no formulário.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property to enable scroll bars in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle deriva o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> classe, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> propriedade para habilitar as barras de rolagem no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, any controls located within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> (but outside of its visible region), can be scrolled to with the scroll bars provided.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> está definida como `true`, todos os controles localizados dentro a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> (mas fora da sua região visível), pode ser rolado para com as barras de rolagem fornecidas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control does not display a caption.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle não exibir uma legenda.

trans-unit.source: If you need a control similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> that can display a caption, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisa de um controle semelhante a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> que pode exibir uma legenda, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and adds a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controlar e adiciona um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control is displayed with a three-dimensional border to distinguish where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control is located in relation to other objects on the form.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle é exibido com uma borda tridimensional para distinguir onde o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle está localizado em relação a outros objetos no formulário.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the method defined in this example is called from within an existing form and that the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace has been added to the source code for the form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que o método definido neste exemplo é chamado de dentro de um formulário existente e que o <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace foi adicionado ao código-fonte para o formulário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Panel" /> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control resizes based on its contents.
<see langword="true" /> if the control automatically resizes based on its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle é redimensionado automaticamente com base no seu conteúdo. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSize" /> property has changed.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSizeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> named `Panel1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> chamado `Panel1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.AutoSizeChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the automatic sizing behavior of the control.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AutoSizeMode" /> values.
Indicates the border style for the control.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="BorderStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="BorderStyle.None" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control is displayed without a border.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle será exibido sem uma borda.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to distinguish the boundaries of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control from other areas on the form.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para distinguir os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle de outras áreas no formulário.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control with a three-dimensional border.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controle com uma borda tridimensional.

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> value.
Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessários quando a alça de controle é criada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> padrão do controle.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
This member is not meaningful for this control.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Fires the event indicating that the panel has been resized.
Inheriting controls should use this in favor of actually listening to the event, but should still call <see langword="base.onResize" /> to ensure that the event is fired for external listeners.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to this control using the TAB key.
<see langword="true" /> if the user can give the focus to the control using the TAB key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o usuário pode fornecer o foco para o controle usando a tecla TAB; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário pressiona a tecla TAB, o foco de entrada é definido para o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: Controls with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Controles com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop%2A> valor da propriedade `false` não são incluídos na coleção de controles na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de tabulação pode ser manipulada, definindo o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.TabStop%2A> property has no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control as it is a container object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel.TabStop%2A> propriedade não tem efeito sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> controlar como ele é um objeto contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: O texto associado a esse controle.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
Returns a string representation for this control.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the control.
